subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Tyrann Mathieu, a Heisman Trophy finalist last season who was recently dismissed from the Louisiana State football team, will not play this season, his father, Tyrone Mathieu, told ESPN.
snippet: Tyrann Mathieu, a Heisman Trophy finalist last season who was recently dismissed from the Louisiana State football team, will not play this season, his father, Tyrone Mathieu, told ESPN.
